caption.p: Boswellia trees and their areas of distribution. ( a) B. sacra tree growing in the dry regions of Oman. ( b) Trees of the species B. frereana prefer rocky terrains of Somalia. ( c) Production of frankincense, the oleogum resin of Boswellia trees. ( d) The growth regions of Boswellia spp. extend from West Africa to India. A particular biodiversity prevails at the Horn of Africa, in and near Somalia. Pictures reproduced with permission of Georg Huber [ 13]. Map data Â©2020 Google, ORION-ME.
